## Source: ossf-package-analysis (864715d8f10c15c7ec5764ac09924180c232cc07c608f041150c29d47ce62899)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'grafana-config-pipeline' @ 99.99.99 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
